shortdesc.ph: Gets the before-mixing playback audio frame from multiple channels.

section.p: After successfully registering the audio observer, if you set the return value of to, the SDK will trigger the callback and send the audio data to you when it captures the audio data before mixing in each channel.

plentry.pd: The name of the channel where the audio frame is located.
The ID of the user who sent the audio frame.

ul.li: true: Valid buffer in AudioFrame, and the mixed captured and playback audio frame is sent out.
false: Invalid buffer in AudioFrame, and the mixed captured and playback audio frame is discarded.
